info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Todd County through 715 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Kilgore, or 19 miles northwest of Valentine, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Francis, Sicangu Village, Lakeview and southwestern Rosebud Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central South Dakota.
